_comment: Created by ianb on 27/06/2014 16:21:52 using v2.1
title: How many patients are affected by delayed transfers of care and how has this changed?
analysis_commentary: Despite individual monthly fluctuations, the number of patients experiencing a delayed transfer of care appears to have decreased over time from 4,940 in August 2010, to a low of 3, 448 in December 2012. Though the impact of public holidays means that delays in December are generally the lowest in the year.
data_source: NHS England, Delayed transfer of care
